name: Mind Maze: Campaign "Triplex"
description: We are happy to present you a new campaign "Triplex", which includes 25 new levels.

name: Diner Bros: Taco Amigos Campaign
description: It's Tuesday, what's for dinner? Tacos should hit the spot and Taco Amigos has just opened. Let's try there! ¡Bienvenido a Taco Amigos!

name: Spacelords: Raiders of the Broken Planet - Wardog Fury Campaign
description: Harec wants Loaht to join his Raiders but the Wardogs are out for his blood. Wardog leader General Marmalade wants all the Aleph and Loaht is a loose end. Loaht’s fury could win the war but who will get to him first? WARDOG FURY is a premium campaign for Raiders of the Broken Planet.

name: The Political Machine 2016: Campaign DLC
description: Battle for your spot in the White House against some of the most famous (and infamous!) presidents in American history. In the new ladder mode, you will choose your political party and launch your campaign against increasingly challenging opponents. Do you have what it takes to go down in history?

name: OneShot: Aftermath
description: OneShot: Aftermath is the fan sequel to the surreal top down Puzzle/Adventure game “OneShot”. One year after the events of Solstice, you and Niko find yourselves thrown back inside the world, but something has changed.

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-1
description: Open a new fighter: Curtis

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-4
description: Open a new fighter: Huppamalin

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-2
description: Open a new fighter: De Havilland

name: Spirit
description: Take control of the helpless beings on the island and guide them. Survive, grow and continue the course of life. Don't let the harsh reality of mother nature take you down.

name: Simutrans: Pak128.Japan
description: The Japanese community has always built many great objects for Simutrans. It was felt, that the scale of pak64 did not meet the desired level of detail. Thus pak128.Japan was designed. Trains are enhanced compared to the standard size and the graphic consistence makes this pak a work of art.

name: Simutrans: Pak64
description: Pak64 is the evolution of the original Simutrans pakset. Many artists have contributed to this pakset since the 8 bit age.

name: Simutrans: Pak128.Britain
description: Developed to give a British theme to Simutrans, this pakset features a wide range of vehicles with emphasis on rail vehicles, highly detailed stations, more accurate looking track for junctions, and a more subdued graphical appearance than the brightly coloured pak128 from which it was originally derived.

name: Simutrans: Pak128.German
description: Brings the German transportation system embedded in typical German towns and industries according to the respective topographic region (coasts, the Alps, etc). Trains is taller than they are in standard pak128. Every building and factory has four views and each type of factory has different aspects.

name: Hidden Expedition: The Price of Paradise - Collector's Edition
description: Your first expedition was going great until someone awakened an Aztec goddess of nature with one thing on her mind – Revenge!

name: Mimpi Dreams: Mars DLC
description: What would be the night sky without shining stars? Mimpi explores the famous Red Planet and investigates the mystery of their disappearance. This new level is almost as large as all previous levels together.

name: Bloodsports.TV: Blood Brawl
description: BLOOD BRAWL is the first free DLC for Bloodsports.TV, including two new maps, four new items, a new boss as well as a brand new game mode: Blood Brawl!

name: Living Legends Remastered: Ice Rose - Collector's Edition
description: Return to Rosemount to stop the Ice Queen this updated classic!

name: Warlock II: The Exiled - The Thrilling Trio
description: This pack brings you three new lords that you can choose as starting perks for your Great Mage. Each lord comes with unique stats and abilities.Lords included in this pack:"Nicolas Frost, the Head Mage of the Temple of Cold and the former Great Mage is offering his services.

name: Electronic Super Joy 2: Gold Edition
description: Do you want the Gold Edition Experience? Do you want to support the developers & musicians of this game? Then buy the GOLD EDITION! 3 new levels, Boss Fight, New Ability, Bonus Music, full game soundtrack of 43 songs, 3 Full-sized HD Digital Posters, and Behind The Scenes developer sketches + in-progress screenshots & GIFs.

name: Voltage: Super Retro
description: VOLTAGE SuperRetro Edition is graphically designed to look almost 100% Amiga/C-64 -game, it is using special shaders. Now you can play Voltage with a SuperRetro look!

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Bells - Collector's Edition
description: An author has vanished, and someone’s enacting the terrible events of his latest novel!

name: Nevertales: Faryon - Collector's Edition
description: Can you claim your powers and save your mom in time?

name: Tornuffalo: Full-Body Action with Vive Trackers
description: Dodge, jump and kick using your whole body! Attach Vive Trackers to your feet and back to play a full-body version of Tornuffalo! Dodge and deflect debris from the storm as you smash gems for points. Free to Tornuffalo owners.

name: Warlock II: The Exiled - The Good, the Bad, & the Muddy
description: This pack adds three powerfull lord units to the array of perks you can choose for your Great Mage at the start of you game.Each lord comes with unique abilities and stats. Lords included:UAG 19: The "Universal Auxiliary Golem 19" will help you to deal with any problems, big or small.

name: Haunted Hotel: Lost Time - Collector's Edition
description: A romantic spa getaway hides a terrible secret!

name: Roads of Rome: New Generation 3 - Collector's Edition
description: This is the super Collector's edition of our New game Roads of Rome: New Generation 3. Collector's edition gives you 6 additional levels, Desktop wallpapers, 2 music tracks, Cache maps for all levels.

name: Haunted Hotel: Eternity - Collector's Edition
description: Outwit the masked mastermind running this hotel and uncover the dark secrets the professor has been hiding from the world.

name: PuppetShow: Fatal Mistake - Collector's Edition
description: Can you stop a new monster brought to life before it’s too late?

name: Twin Mind: Murderous Jealousy - Collector's Edition
description: Go on a new exciting adventure following a story of two twin investigators! Complete puzzles, solve riddles and demonstrate your intelligence to discover all the secrets that are hidden in this mysterious case.

name: The Witch's Apprentice: A Magical Mishap - Collector's Edition
description: The Collector's Edition includes: - 10 additional Levels (Help Grimelda on another adventure and defeat the evil ice spirit to save the poor villagers!) - Wallpapers - ingame Strategy Guide

name: Midnight Calling: Jeronimo - Collector's Edition
description: The forest holds many secrets...

name: Mystery Tales: Master of Puppets - Collector's Edition
description: Can you save a family from a deadly presence?

name: Emerland Solitaire 2: Collector's Edition
description: An exciting journey into the world of magical Solitaire awaits! A stunning new game with classic rules. Hundreds of fun levels, dangerous opponents and heroic companions await you in an adventure full of mysteries and secrets!

name: Hidden Expedition: A King's Line - Collector's Edition
description: King Arthur’s Legend Comes Alive!

name: Labyrinths of the World: The Game of Minds - Collector's Edition
description: Desperate Times Call for Desperate Measures...

name: Labyrinths of the World: Hearts of the Planet - Collector's Edition
description: A geological adventure into a secret world inside our planet!

name: Moai 6: Unexpected Guests - Collector's Edition
description: Join two heroes on one grand adventure! Guide Hika-Ri and Kao-Ri on the adventure of their lives and enjoy countless hours of fun on the enchanted island of Tapa-Tui!

name: Sumatra: Fate of Yandi - Collector's Edition
description: The Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Collector's Edition contains a downloadable art book, the full soundtrack and a short bonus game!

name: Fatal Evidence: Art of Murder - Collector's Edition
description: A serial killer has resurfaced, and he’s calling you out!

name: Christmas Stories: The Christmas Tree Forest - Collector's Edition
description: Only you can save Christmas!

name: Worlds Align: Deadly Dream - Collector's Edition
description: Can you and your friends save all the worlds in time?

name: Bridge to Another World: Endless Game - Collector's Edition
description: These enchanting worlds can be deadly…

name: The Christmas Spirit: Journey Before Christmas - Collector's Edition
description:
This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Break the spell and save Carlos from Mrs. Tovenare's control!
- See if you can solve every puzzle on Easy and Hard!
- Collect gifts and holiday treats from around the world!
- Enjoy exclusive music, wallpapers, concept art, and more!
- Complete strategy guide included! Always on hand when you need it!

name: Ms. Holmes: Five Orange Pips - Collector's Edition
description: An intruder’s puzzling calling-card means certain doom for the Holmes family line!

name: Jewel Match Solitaire: Collector's Edition
description: Due to popular demand we created this enhanced version of Jewel Match Solitaire, the Collector's Edition. Featuring 320 (!) completely NEW levels (different from the regular version) and 18 bonus Solitaire variants, such as Klondike, Spider and Freecell, it's the ultimate relaxing Solitaire game!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Harbinger - Collector's Edition
description: A small-town murder case hides a revelation that will shake the agency to its core!

name: Maze: Sinister Play - Collector's Edition
description: Can you stop a deadly evil waiting in an abandoned school?

name: Chimeras: Cherished Serpent - Collector's Edition
description: A series of deaths plague a small town, but who or what caused them?

name: Christmas Stories: The Gift of the Magi - Collector's Edition
description: Help your little sister get a second chance this Christmas after she gets on the naughty list.

name: Dragon's Eye
description: Dragon's Eye is an action adventure game filled with fast paced combat against dangerous creatures in an ever changing open world. Play your way through this adventure as Yen, a brave knight trying to prove his might against Gonti, a dragon that is hellbent on destroying everything in sight.

name: Scarlet Hollow: Episode 1
description: The free-to-play first episode of a horror-mystery game with dark humor and hand-drawn art from award-winning graphic novelist Abby Howard.

name: Dere Exe: Classic Edition
description: Experience the original DERE EXE in all its unstable glory, rage-inducing controls, and all. The events in this game are not canon in the AppSir Games Universe, only the 2021 Remake establishes the continuity and lore of the series. Install this free DLC and find the game in your local files.

name: Crowntakers: Undead Undertakings
description: Crowntakers – Undead Undertakings leads you into the land of the living dead. Explore the sinister depths of the Necropolis where death and decay have left their foul footprints. Battle the horrors risen from their graves like zombies, skeletons and vampires, lead your fellow mercenaries to victory and back to sunnier climes.

name: Seek Girl VIII
description: This is a strategy adventure game. The player needs to help the boy find the safest route to rescue the girl.

name: Onmyoudou: Arcade Edition
description: Onmyoudou - Arcade Edition is an endless action RPG game.Try your best strategy to defeat the slimes. Use your powerfull attacks and random itens around the environment.Defeat a slime and receive a "Tamashi", the ghost souls. Reach as many "Tamashi" as possible.

name: Danger Gazers: Next Stop
description: A new path stop has appeared! Mr. Honest invites all the risk takers to spin the Baraban. It might be your lucky day if you've got the crystals or... it could leave you empty handed as it usually happens.

name: Pankapu: Episode 2
description: Pankapu: the Last Aegis delves deeper into Djaha’rell’s dreams to find Faith, the Last Aegis.

name: Necronomistore: Black Friday - Season One
description: Delve into the world of Necronomistore, a shopping Goliath which is currently in the process of gearing up for a sure fire Black Friday disaster. But there's bigger stakes at play, its up to you to keep an eye on the resident depressed rantaholic janitor and help uncover a sinister conspiracy.

name: The Sych Story: Ded's Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Phenomenon32
description: Phenomenon 32 is a free 2D exploration/platforming game with RPG elements.

name: Poly Puzzle: Furries
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with furries.

name: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue
description: Axilon: Legend of Artifacts - Prologue is a first-person fantasy action RPG game. Awaken your true power and resist the forces of evil that are trying to destroy your world.

name: Super Drag Race
description: Modify and tune your sport cars, drive quarter mile drag races, get money and upgrade your car better. Enjoy for awesome cars and drag strips

name: Tortuga
description: The goal is is to explore the island and collect all the fruits without dying. You have to be perfect and it' nearly impossible. You have to be precise and it's really difficult. You have to have a lot of patience and it's demanding. But definitely work hard.

name: My Lovely Daughter: The Inquisitor
description: A mysterious guest is coming to the Salach Village. The Inquisitor DLC includes new game mechanic, new story and gameplay adjustment for My Lovely Daughter.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Lincoln
description: The level-80 sense of purpose helped him to reach incredible heights. He is ready to share it with you. Pinch off just a small piece and you will become a great president ... that is a monopolist. And Uncle Abe's inheritance of 100 gold, 50.000 chips and the legendary dice will help to establish yourself in your new status.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Napoleon
description: He majestically walks over conquered lands. He holds his head proudly. He directs his victorious gaze towards new territories. He sets the goal. He reaches one. His main gift to you is a sense of distinctiveness. You'll also get 100 gold and 50,000 chips.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Cleopatra
description: Brush up your leopard grace, get the gold of all the desert sands and the greatness of the sun as a bonus. It's Cleopatra! The great queen of Egypt is ready to give you the vacant seat of her favorite cat. Together you will bring everyone to their knees within a radius of the Business Tour.

name: Business Tour: Crazy Heroes - Wild bird
description: Behold the superman, superpigeon, superpostman! And yeah, he can never have enough "super". He is a real superguy! Long time ago when he was a little kid he found his true calling. He delivers parcels at the speed of light anywhere in the world! But not exactly at the speed of light, because he isn't a very good pilot.

name: Business Tour: Football - Forward Number 10
description: It is so hard for one to pretend to be a normal man, and those wings under one's shirt are not making it any better. But he has to be patient if he wants to play. And he loves to play so much! He may lend you his nimbus, if you want it.

name: Business Tour: Crazy Heroes - Mr. and Mrs. Balloonski
description: There are many different superpowers. Someone can move objects with his mind, someone can burns everything in his path with a look, and someone is even immortal! And there are superheroes who created explicitly for something special but even they don't know for what... But they don't care what other people say.

name: Business Tour: Football - Forward Number 7
description: Victory is always around you! Guru of motivation will explain to you why fortitude and self-improvement are important. He will teach you how to turn on your handsome-man mode, and how to go only forward to victory! And of course your self-confidence will grow. Dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips will only contribute to this.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - King
description: Everyone has a dream. Someone wants a castle made of cotton candy, someone wants to rule the world, and someone wants to build a super-mega monopoly! But often dreams are just dreams... That's when Martin Luther King comes to your rescue! Should you follow him and he will lead to the fulfillment of all your plans for sure.

name: Business Tour: Great Leaders - Caesar
description: This time-management genius can teach you how to plan out your day. Only with him, last on the agenda is always victory over your enemies. For added confidence in your success, the indestructible Caesar pack includes 100 gold, 50,000 chips and his legendary dice. Ave, Caesar!

name: Business Tour: Crazy Heroes - Rainbow mercenary
description: Do you like to dream, have your head in the clouds, build sweet castles in the air, and ride the rainbow? He definitely doesn't like it. At all! He isn't an ordinary unicorn. He didn't get rose-colored glasses at birth.

name: Broken World
description: An Action Adventure RPG where the player explores 4 different islands to light 4 different beacons of power - The Fire Monuments. While exploring these areas, the player will encounter puzzles, combat challenges, and will have to use their different abilities to reach the end.

name: Amaranto
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic world divided into districts, Mio and her childhood friend Shizuku hears strange rumors at school about "vampiric" murders. Who is the culprit, and how does it tie to that mysterious girl in white?

name: Fukawa-chan
description: This is a fangame about one of the protagonists of the Danganronpa series. Touko Fukawa doesn't have a fun life. In fact, she has a pretty miserable one. Between bullying, self-loathing, and mental illness, an average day in Touko's life is very painful. And today, you get to follow her through it.

name: Off the Chains Disc Golf
description: Off The Chains Disc Golf is a lighthearted disc golf simulation developed for VR from the ground up. Play alone or with friends and learn how to become a disc golf pro with realistic disc flight physics. Earn Chain Link points to unlock new discs and customize your own collection.

name: Band-kun
description: Sin descripción

name: AKB48 World
description: Sin descripción

name: Crave
description:
This is the story of Cacoe, a stick man made of chalk, with special X-Ray vision. Whilst reading a newspaper he comes across an article about someone called Fenelda, this triggers a very early memory in his life, and he sets off to the Hotel Carnaby to investigate.

Crave contains nude scenes and adult themes, and is not suitable for everybody, be warned. There is also a complete 1980's parody sub-adventure game included within the main adventure called 'Slug Princess', in which a young girl is transformed into a slug and has to find a magical gem in order to save her love, the prince.

name: Soccer Battles
description: Sin descripción

name: Famicom Mini: Clu Clu Land
description: Famicom Mini: Clu Clu Land is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a port of the Famicom game Clu Clu Land, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Famicom Mini: Super Mario Bros. 2
description: Famicom Mini Series: Super Mario Bros. 2 is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a port of the Famicom game Super Mario Bros. 2 (known as Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels in America and Europe), and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Score! Hero 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Days
description: The team that created White Night has gathered once again to offer you a hauntingly unique VR experience. Somewhere between Twin Peaks and The X-­Files, Dark Days is a new fantastic virtual reality adventure. You will have to discover what’s going on with an eerie desert motel and its surroundings by solving a number of puzzles. Immerse yourself in the rich environments you will come across, but be careful and smart! Something is roaming around you...

name: Super Boxing Championship!
description:
Knock out your foes using a full body physics interaction system with simulated weight and collision.

Brawl against an infinite number of random opponents of all skill levels and backgrounds. Earn cash to unlock items such as outfits, hairstyles, and emotes! Battle in an exhibition match or an eight-man bracket tournament.

Build up a hall-of-fame worthy record while destroying any random opponent in your path during your exhibition matches, or earn as many trophies as possible through conquering the Amateur, Professional, and All-Star bracket tournaments!

name: Double Play
description: Sin descripción

name: Famicom Mini: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima
description: Famicom Mini: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a conversion of Hudson Soft's Famicom game Adventure Island. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Famicom Mini: Balloon Fight
description: Famicom Mini: Balloon Fight is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of the Famicom game Balloon Fight, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Famicom Mini: Dig Dug
description: Famicom Mini: Dig Dug is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Namco's Famicom game Dig Dug, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Smashteroid
description: A small fast paced platformer game

name: SpellForce III: Reforced
description: SpellForce III Reforced is a unique mix of an epic RPG storyline blended with accessible real-time strategy elements, designed to offer a riveting console experience to fans and newcomers alike.

name: Famicom Mini: Famicom Tantei Club - Kieta Koukeisha
description:
Famicom Mini: Famicom Tantei Club - Kieta Koukeisha is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of the Famicom title Famicom Tantei Club, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance, similar to how they re-released classic NES games in North America.

This port has both parts (Zenpen and Kouhen) of Kieta Koukeisha, thus the player wouldn't need to change disks like in the original Famicom Disk System release.

name: Famicom Mini: Famicom Tantei Club Part II - Ushiro ni Tatsu Shoujo
description:
Famicom Mini: Famicom Tantei Club Part II - Ushiro ni Tatsu Shoujo is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a port of the Famicom Disk System game Famicom Tantei Club Part II: Ushiro ni Tatsu Shoujo, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

This port has both parts (Zenpen and Kouhen) parts of the original game, so the wouldn't need to change disks, like on the original Famicom Disk System release.

name: Guy: By Hook or by Crook
description: Guide Guy through his day, first by finding what to do, then hopefully and ultimately achieve the goal, by any mean necessary!

name: Famicom Mini: Makaimura
description: Famicom Mini: Makaimura is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Capcom's Famicom game Ghosts 'n Goblins, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Famicom Mini: Hikari Shinwa - Palutena no Kagami
description: Famicom Mini: Hikari Shinwa - Palutena no Kagami is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of the Famicom game Kid Icarus, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Famicom Mini: Nazo no Murasame-jou
description: Famicom Mini: Nazo no Murasame-jou is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of the Famicom game The Mysterious Murasame Castle, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Linn the Protector and the Seven Daughters of Ran
description:
Linn, hand maiden of Lady Frigg, must protect Eric - the son of the Jarl of North Anglia-, from being drowned by the seven daughters of Ran.

And then she must face Ran herself.

name: Famicom Mini: Ganbare Goemon! - Karakuri Douchuu
description: Famicom Mini: Ganbare Goemon! - Karakuri Douchuu is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Konami's Famicom game Ganbare Goemon! Karakuri Douchuu, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Motivational Hero
description: Motivational Hero is a Emotional and Motivational Puzzle-Platformer 2d with levels based in Motivational Analogies

name: Bright Lights of Svetlov
description: Bright Lights of Svetlov is a short, story-focused first person quest about a Soviet family facing harsh trials. Set in a fictional provincial town, it carefuly recreates the atmosphere and vibe of mid 1980s.

name: Into the Metaverse: Theme Park Dark Ride Experience
description: Into the Metaverse is a VR Dark Ride Pilot about humanity's quest for ever deeper immersion showing scenes from the past, present and future. VR may be the ultimate Dark Ride tech. This is a 10 minute polished Dark Ride "Pilot" that will leave you wanting more.

name: Tower of Magic
description: Randomly generated Magic Tower dungeons A strategy-based fixed-value Roguelike RPG

name: Eden
description: Eden is a world full of adventure, exploration, creation, and play. Come join us as we create the world together.

name: Famicom Mini: Mappy
description: Famicom Mini: Mappy is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Namco's Famicom video game Mappy. This game was not released in America or Europe as part of the Classic NES Series, but was rather exclusive to Japan. Few to no alterations were made to the game, as it was intended to be a direct port of Mappy.

name: Lethal Gamble 1 Werewolf Puzzle
description: “Lethal Gamble 1 Werewolf Puzzle”is a suspense reasoning emotional work based on werewolf killing rules.A group of college students accidentally came to a mysterious villa. They wanted to play a game of werewolf killing.You have only five days left to refute the truth.

name: Beauty vs. Robot
description: "Beautiful Girl vs Mecha" is a card RPG game with the theme of the future eschatology. Players will be transformed into army commanders, and they will fight through card battles by means of instant battles and four different occupations.

name: Zee.End
description: A secret organization makes a critical mistake in the development of chemical weapons. As a result, the entire population of the Montib island is infected with an unknown virus. You need to survive among zombies on a huge 20x20 km map.

name: Night of the Meteor
description:
'Night of the Meteor' is a non commercial Fan-Adventure in development.

"Ah! An unwelcome visitor!
How silly of me, I should have tied you to my bed!"
That's how Edna Edison (a nurse who's as nasty as she is ugly) used to greet the male visitors, which were unmindfull enough to enter the old Victorian mansion, built on the outskirts of town, where a meteor has crashed over 20 years ago.

Nothing has changed since then. Her husband, Dr.Fred still wasn't at dinner for the past five years and their son, Weird Ed a paramilitary nut is still waiting for his commando package.

So, every time when you play this game, it'll be The Night of the Meteor!

name: Loftus and the Sky Cap
description: Inessa is woken by the smell of smoke. She races down the stair case to discover the workshop torched and no trace of her Master Loftus. The townsfolk are convinced that a dragon must be responsible or that the crazy inventor must simply have blown himself up- but Inessa believes otherwise.

name: Famicom Mini: SD Gundam World - Gachapon Senshi: Scramble Wars
description: Famicom Mini: SD Gundam World - Gachapon Senshi: Scramble Wars is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Bandai's Famicom game SD Gundam World: Capsule Warriors - Scramble Wars, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Crossfire II
description: Crossfire II is an Retro / Arcade / Top-Down Shooter, originally released in 2002 for the AMIGA. The main part of the game is a classic, fast paced, single player story campaign. Fly different space ships and fight, to save the universe as you know it. Also you get a survival and a local PvP mode.

name: Smugglers 5: Invasion - Warrior Within
description: With this downloadable content (DLC) you will receive three background stories (mini-quests) for the game "Smugglers 5: Invasion" - "Warrior Within", "Golden Claw" and an "Aftermath" preview, "First Contact".

name: Apex Legends: Bangalore Edition
description:
Includes:

- Exclusive Legendary “Super Soldier" Bangalore Skin
- Exclusive Legendary "Trusty Sidekick" G7 Skin
- Exclusive "Mark of a Hero" Gun Charm
- Exclusive "Striker" Badge
- 1000 Apex Coins

name: Famicom Mini: Mario Bros.
description: Famicom Mini: Mario Bros. is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo It is a remake of the Famicom game Mario Bros. (note: not its arcade incarnation), and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Perfect Crime: Collector's death
description: Love and hate between a collector and several ghostly visitors.

name: Soul at Stake: Funeral of the Flowers
description: "Funeral of the Flowers" is the new DLC of Soul at Stake, including a new Devil "the Geisha", a new Gambler "Aoki", and a new map "Sakura Shrine". EXTRA BONUS: The Geisha gesture x1, the Geisha's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's Trump 【Bystander】 x5.

name: Lords of Doom: Part One - The Black God
description:
Lords of Doom is a shareware fantasy role-playing game. A prosperous kingdom has been overrun by demons, and now a sole hero controlled by the player must put an end to this invasion and restore peace in the realm.

The game uses a custom role-playing system which is based on a number of character attributes and skills the player can build. There are no character classes, and the player may develop fighting, thieving and magic skills based on their choice. Experience points are awarded for exploration, interaction with NPCs and successful combat encounters.

The setting is a vast fantasy world with several human kingdoms, also inhabited by various fantasy creatures, including dragons and other monsters, as well as different types of undead. However, humanoid fantasy races like elves or dwarves are not present. The state of human civilization is comparable to that of Ancient Rome, except for the widespread use of magic.

name: Soul at Stake: Terror Cruise
description: “赌船惊魂”是《灵魂筹码》的新增内容，包含一名新恶灵“卡屠”，一名新赌徒“明美”，以及一张新地图“幸运星号”。

name: Soul at Stake: Frozen Village
description: The Frozen Village is a new addition to the world of Soul at Stakes, it will include a new Devil, "The Witch", and a new map, "The Frozen Village". This DLC will be free for a limited time, one month from release date until October 14, 2018 , after this timeframe it will be changed to a paid DLC.

name: Soul at Stake: Blood Ritual
description: “圣血之殇”是《灵魂筹码》的扩展内容，包含一名新恶灵“血仆”，一名新赌徒“淑芬”，以及一张新地图“血色医院”。额外赠送1个血仆嘲讽动作、5张血仆专属底牌、5张淑芬专属底牌、5张淑芬组队底牌【置身事外】，以及200000筹码。

name: Soul at Stake: Lament of the Lovers
description: “情蛊靡音”是《灵魂筹码》的扩展内容，包含一名新恶灵“惘灵”，一名新赌徒“荣氏”，以及一张新地图“遗情古寨”。额外赠送1个惘灵嘲讽动作、5张惘灵专属底牌、5张荣氏专属底牌、5张荣氏组队底牌【置身事外】。

name: Famicom Mini: Star Soldier
description: Famicom Mini: Star Soldier is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Hudson Soft's Famicom game Star Soldier, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Ironcast: The Stirling Pack
description: The Stirling Pack includes an additional Ironcast, ‘The Stirling’; as well as a new Commander, Katherine Chapman.

name: Look and Find: Curiosity
description: A game of searching scenes, finding objects, earning coins and unlocking new levels. The objects you find will be added to your collection and can be viewed at any time.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Turtle Wars
description: This new DLC pack for Stardock’s massive RTS features new unique gameplay scenarios and new maps to keep your skirmishes fresh.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Oblivion
description: The Post Human Coalition and the Substrate continue to fight for control of worlds across the galaxy as the PHC looks to expand their reach. Crush your enemies and conquer a variety of new maps, or face down an unexpected and powerful enemy in the new Oblivion scenario.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Secret Missions
description: Exciting new scenarios, new units, and huge maps await you in Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation’s largest DLC yet! Take on the role of a PHC leader and conquer dangerous missions where the odds are stacked against you, or join with the Substrate to repel your PHC oppressors.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Juggernaut
description: Pummel your enemies into submission with brand new, heavy-hitting Juggernauts! These massive warships may be expensive to make, but they have the potential to dominate the battlefield and turn the tide of a war quickly.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Gauntlet
description: The war for control continues in Gauntlet! Featuring a new single-player scenario and some new maps for multiplayer, Gauntlet will have you beating your foes into submission in one exciting battle after the next.

name: Voltage: Episode 2
description: In Episode 2, you try to bring freedom to Voltage and fight against evil forces as you traverse the Voltage Town, Red Forest and many other areas. Your mission is to find resistance scientists, together you might be able to bring peace to the Voltage.

name: RoShamBo Arena: Starter Fighter Pack
description: The Starter Fighter Pack will give you everything you need to become the best in RoShamBo arena!

name: Mantis Burn Racing: Elite Class
description: Take your Mantis Burn Racing gameplay to the next level with a brand-new Class of ‘Elite’ vehicles that come complete with their own stand-alone career campaign.

name: Mantis Burn Racing: Snowbound Pack
description: Expand your Mantis Burn Racing experience with all-new free content in the ‘Snowbound Pack’. Put the freeze on your opponents as you jump, bump and slide your way across four stunning new snow-themed tracks that will push your driving skills to the limits!

name: Mantis Burn Racing: Battle Cars
description: Introducing ‘BATTLE CARS’ the brand-new combat racing pack from MANTIS BURN RACING! Unleash explosive levels of fun with an all-new class of highly armed, battle-ready vehicles in intense online combat or frenetic split-screen battles for up to 4 players.

name: Professor Crackbrain: And the Awakening of the Weredog
description: Professor Crackbrain - and the awakening of the weredog is a classic point & click adventure game full of nostalgic allusions, pixelish puzzles and chiptunish music.

name: Famicom Mini: TwinBee
description:
Famicom Mini: TwinBee is a recreation of the original TwinBee video game released on a variety of Japanese consoles in the 1980s. Released in 2004 under the 'Famicom Mini' label, this port brings all the material from the original counterpart and converts them for the handheld Game Boy Advance system.

As with the original, this port is only available in the country of Japan.

name: Fortune's Tavern: The Fantasy Tavern Simulator - Miniature Gods
description: Miniature Gods is the fourth DLC available for 'Fortune's Tavern: The Fantasy Tavern Simulator!' In 'Miniature Gods' you get the chance to make new, unique allies in the form of spirits, demi-gods, and demons who will fight beside you as you quest in the Enchanted Forest or help you carry out raids on rival taverns.

name: MagiCats Builder: Infinite Pack
description: Your power can’t wait. Buy the infinite pack and let your imagination be THE only limit.

name: Fantasyland: All Heroes
description: All the heroes in the fantasyland.

name: Tekling 2: Overdrive
description: Suit up and Boot up! Tekling is back in an all new adventure as you battle your way to defeat robots from taking over the world! Wear new suits and use new abilities to stop the robot uprising once and for all!

name: Catlateral Damage: VR
description: Catlateral Damage is a first-person destructive house cat simulator where you play as a cat and knock as much stuff onto the ground as possible. Now with VR support for the HTC Vive!

name: Pathmaker
description: Pathmaker is a single-player puzzle game with the goal to get all of your carts from one side to the other. Cross tracks, avoid obstacles, and make sure the carts don't collide with each other. 130 levels range from simple to very challenging. Exercise your logic skills!

name: World War Academy: Commander 1
description: The Alliance Army and the Group Army have almost officially broken up, and the war is imminent. I was ordered to come to the Central South Theater command, and that's where the story begins...

name: Famicom Mini: Wrecking Crew
description: Famicom Mini: Wrecking Crew is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of the Famicom game Wrecking Crew, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Hunger Dungeon: New Challenger Pack
description: The new challenger coming...

name: Guardians of Graxia: Elves & Dwarves
description: In this first major expansion for Guardians of Graxia, Elves & Dwarves, the world of Graxia is greeted by two new Guardians from faraway islands, Flist the deceitful Elf and Broxin the greedy Dwarf. Included in the expansion are ever more powerful units and abilities that you will be able to use in battle, as well as six additional...

name: -Sprout-
description: -SPROUT- is a mini precision-platformer built for speed-running. Run, jump and dash your way through 100 levels across five unique lands, and restore your world to its former glory.

name: Placefront
description: PLACEFRONT is a stylized and relaxing city builder with unique architecture, drivable vehicles, diverse biomes, and over 150 ready-to-place objects. Also includes 4 stock levels and Ramp Dream level.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - Prequel Trilogy Character Pack
description: Return to where it all began with some of your favorite characters from Episodes I, II and III with the The Prequel Trilogy Character Pack. This character pack includes Darth Maul, Padmé, Jango Fett, Jar Jar Binks, and Anakin Skywalker.

name: Ship Surveyor Through the Ages: VR
description: The Lloyd's Register Foundation Heritage & Education Centre is proud to introduce our unique VR experience, set across three different time periods. You take on the role of surveyor, tasked with tracking down and investigating hazards and faults on board three ships throughout history.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing - Lake Beasts Equipment Pack
description: A 53-item pack containing a wide variety of items from boats to baits that will help you find, hook and land the elusive monster boss fish found in The Catch: Carp & Coarse.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing - Jezioro Bestii
description: A remastered, favourite is back but with new species and bigger fish! With 17 different species of fish and 25 Boss Fish, this venue fits every style of fishing with predators weighing over 100lb and carp to 50lb.

name: Breach: Veil Demon DLC
description: Every session is different in Breach with a new type of enemy: The Veil Demon. The Veil Demon Pack is the perfect complement for the demon inside of you.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Nature Class
description: With power over life and death a Nature wizard is vital for a successful team composition. She is Grimoire’s primary healing class but like all classes in Grimoire she can also do solid damage.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Fire Class
description: Fire is designed to be the easiest class to play well but it can also be one of the hardest to master. At its core, the class is an area-of-effect damage dealer. This makes it great for controlling large areas and supporting a battle with consistent high damage.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Lightning Class
description: Lightning is a long-range specialist that uses air, electricity, and storms to strike down his enemies from afar. By altering allied wizards electrical lifeforce he can also use electricity to revitalize and energize allies giving health and movement bonuses.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Earth Class
description: Earth is a medium to close range damage dealer with great survivability and a mix of class based utility spells. His passive spell gives him damage reduction in relation to his current mana which adds a level of toughness not seen in other classes.

name: Bunker
description: A game in the genre of horror that will immerse you in the story of a prisoner who had a chance to try to get out of the bunker in which strange things happen. In the game you will have to solve small puzzles, learn the history of the game while reading diaries and of course hide.

name: Famicom Mini: Famicom Mukashibanashi - Shin Onigashima
description:
Famicom Mini: Famicom Mukashibanashi - Shin Onigashima is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of the Famicom game Shin Onigashima, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

This version contains both parts of the game (Zenpen and Kouhen), so the player wouldn't need to change disks like the original Famicom Disk System release.

name: Five Nights at F***boy's 2: Final Mix
description:
Five Nights at F***boy’s 2 is a FNaF fangame and sequel to surprise hit Five Nights at F***boy's created by Sable Lynn and Joshua Shaw in RPG Maker VX Ace.

This version includes the Final Mix: Game of the Year content, including the elusive Afterstory.

name: Heisei Shin Onigashima
description:
Heisei Shin Onigashima is an episodical game released for the Super Famicom. It is a port of the Satellaview 4-part broadcast game BS Shin Onigashima, which in turn is a remake of the original Famicom Mukashi Banashi: Shin Onigashima. It was released first as a Nintendo Power digital distribution downloadable game, and later ported to a released in cartridge form, in two parts (Zenpen and Kouhen).

Heisei Shin Onigashima would later be re-released on the Wii and Wii U Virtual Console (still in two parts).

name: Lost Valley
description: Lost Valley is an excellent freeware action-oriented RPG that offers over 25 hours of gameplay, a lot of neat weapons and magic items, and smooth animations.

name: Death Blade
description:
Your name is Corwin Ironfist. You are part of the city guard, trapped in an underground complex of a city in grave danger. Due to a mishap very early in the morning, you have no sword and no armor. You have reason to believe that whatever is plaguing the city, is located in this complex. You take a deep breath and move forward, to whatever awaits.

Death Blade is a role playing game designed for the Macintosh. It's interface has been designed to be easy to use and quick to access. This is especially important since combat is real-time (well sorta).

Death Blade is not overly complex as some roleplaying games are. It has been designed to allow even younger adventurers to take part in the quest. While the interface is simple enough for younger users, the graphics and game play should be a challenge for experienced players as well.

There are sixteen levels to Death Blade. Each level poses a different problem that you have to solve. Some levels require a strong sword, while others require a systematic mind.

Research with the game and see if you can discover ways of being more effective. For example, the creatures always attack immediately following their movement phase. It is impossible for you to land an attack before a creature when the creature has just moved forward. However, if you time your movements, you can move forward and attack him before he can advance. It takes practice.

Good luck.

name: Defender of the Crown: Digitally Remastered Edition
description:
This edition is the first release of Defender of the Crown for Windows / Macintosh and it is a remake of the original game. This digitally remastered edition features enhanced graphics and sound, and additional material.

Years later, an original version of the game with original graphics and sounds was also released for Windows, which makes this a remake and a separate game to the regular port of the original MS-DOS version to Windows.

name: Desert Trek
description: The sequel to Camel. Can you make it across the entire desert, keeping one step ahead of the cannibals?

name: Dracula's Castle
description: Dracula's Castle is a text and adventure game. The objective of the game is to "defeat the evil vampire, find the treasure hidden on the island, and leave the island with the treasure".

name: Eric's Ultimate Solitaire
description: A collection of many popular and not-so-popular solo card games. This is more than just a solitaire game, with detailed images, and event-based sounds. The player can choose from 23 different games, and keep information on game play (success, failure, speed).

name: Eternity Inn
description: It's easy to check in, but you can't check out until you've outwitted the innkeeper by solving the puzzles in your room to find the hidden exit! This is a challenging game we've created for puzzle-lovers. Eternity Inn is a freeware game - no registration necessary - and is freely distributable.

name: Dire Vengeance
description: Pandora ventures into the Dark Realm to slay the demons who threaten her world. Collect Soul Orbs to upgrade your abilities and uncover arcane weaponry. Slash your way through frozen wastelands, lava filled chambers, and caverns of putrefying flesh as you slaughter hordes of condemned monstrosities.

name: Lunatic Dawn: Book of Futures
description: Lunatic Dawn - Book of Futures is an RPG Windows PC game released by Artdink. You can be a hero or a villain depending on what tasks you wish to undertake. You can also smuggle, kidnap, assassinate, rescue, kill monsters, deliver items, and more. The game offers non-linear game-play where you can roam as you please in a randomly generated world with each game-play. The game also has Medieval Japan, Arabian, and Medieval European styled environments where you can start from or travel to. You can also recruit your own party members from each area as you wish also. If you are looking for a different type of RPG where you can play as you want, this is a must try.

name: Magus
description: Magus is a Korean-made hybrid of a role-playing and a real-time strategy game. The game is set in the medieval fantasy world Castalia, and involves battle for dominance between various kingdoms and provinces. Combat is handled in a RTS fashion, with the player- and AI-controlled forces moving on an overhead battle screen and executing commands in real time. The battles occur between medium-size parties led by individual characters with unique attributes and personalities. These leaders also receive experience, level up, and learn magic spells in a RPG fashion. The game's structure and pacing are also reminiscent of an RPG rather than an RTS: there is no base-building or resource management, and the missions involves completing fairly linear stages that consist chiefly of combat and plot-advancing dialogue.

name: Maverick Gunn and the Eye of Oggun
description: You are Maverick Gunn, treasure hunter and renegade History teacher. You start the morning at home as usual and after a few minutes of conversation with a mysterious and dangerous looking man, you are drawn into the chase for a huge diamond...and face to face with an ancient mystery.

name: Memories Fade
description: Made for MAGS February 2017, with the theme "As Time Goes By". After the loss of his beloved wife, an old man seems to be forgetting her. With the help of an old photo, can his son remind him of the good times they once had?

name: Minifeg: The Search
description: In the search for his father, our hero, Minifeg, gets stuck in time when his newly built machine does not work as expected. Now he must also find out how to return home.

name: Money Mansion
description:
This is Episode 100 of the Maniac Mansion Mania series.
It could also be played without knowing any other episode.

As Fred and Edna come back after a journey, they have to notice that
their house is on sale at Stan's. To buy it back they need one million
dollars.
Fortunately, Fred's uncle Edenezer is that rich he wouldn't mind lending them the money. Or isn't it?

- 3 playable characters with individual abilities
- a huge and completely new location
- countless references to Maniac Mansion, other episodes, other games, movies, series, music and much more.

name: My Father's Secret
description: Your father abandoned you as a child. After many years of searching, you have tracked down where he lives. What awaits you in this mysterious house on the hill?

name: Mysterious Song
description: Mysterious Song is an RPG strongly influenced by the style of the early Final Fantasy games. Your character is a knight, sent by the king to investigate the trouble arising in the land, with the help of two other party members whom you pick up as you travel. The combat is turn-based, with a very simple magic system based on spell points. One party member is a mage, one specializes in physical combat, and your main character is a mix. There is no class selection, only leveling up.

name: Gate
description: Gate is an action-adventure game for the Macintosh. It blends action, adventure, and brain-teasing challenges into an addictive fast-action game with smooth animation, exciting music and sound effects. Escape the castle's prison, battle enemies, solve puzzles, and defeat your captor to restore peace to the land.

name: Q1K3
description: An homage to Quake in 13kb of JavaScript.

name: Revived Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Evan Quest
description: EVAN QUEST - Bad Dudes have taken over New York City. The DoD sends in Evan Quest to stop them. Save the Hostages and clear the Bad Dudes from several progressively challenging levels.

name: Hide Seek Survive
description: Experience true horror as you move from room to room, looking for a doll that can get you out of the most dangerous game of hide and seek ever played. Be careful though because there is something in the house looking for you as well...

name: Chicken Duty
description: You've agreed to watch over the neighbor's chicken while they're away, and now you must lead it to safety as quick as possible!

name: Where's My Lunch?!
description: Where's My Lunch?! is an action stealth adventure game, with the quest of finding your lunch during the zombie apocalypse. Use impromptu weapons such as rakes, vacuums, wax machines, good ole Sally, and more! Set up zombies in environmental traps to help you move closer to your glorious lunch.

name: Piggy: Hunt
description: Piggy: Hunt is a fast-paced survival horror multiplayer game. Survivors must work together to survive and escape from the Infected.

name: YouRiding: Surfing and Bodyboarding Game
description: A realistic surfing and bodyboarding game. Play for the top spot of the ranking at real spots like Kirra in Australia or Supertubes in Portugal, create your own waves and share them to the community, or play against other players in 16 surfers bracket competitions.

name: Splash
description: Splash is a third-person splash damage based action RPG where you play as an alchemist traveling the land, creating more potions.

name: Day of Dragons: Acid Spitter Drake
description: The Acid Spitter Drake is a fast, agile, and hardy pack hunter with an acidic bite that applies decay to its victims.

name: Sexcraft: Sofiya and the Lewd Clan
description: Play as Sofiya, Defeat monsters, Become a powerful witch and Have sex along the way. Can you beat her old master?

name: The Entity: Returning Home
description: In this DLC you will find out the truth behind the creature after the events of The Entity and what it actually wants with Jack and his family.

name: Tales of Glory 2: Retaliation
description: Follow the adventure of Andrew "Dog" Carter, a former SAS operative and his International Task Force squad as they fight against a global terrorist organization called Quantum in Tales Of Glory 2 - Retaliation, a VR tactical shooter adventure mixing huge immersive battles against hundreds of NPCs and infiltration missions.

name: Squad: Canadian Armed Forces
description: A new battlefield for SquadThe Canadian Armed Forces DLC is free for all owners of Squad and is an all new faction developed by community members together with Offworld Industries. Featuring two new maps on the North American continent, three new vehicles and completely custom and hand crafted character models it will add a complete new...

name: Spooky Night: Remastered
description: Grimelda is still at it but with some new tricks and treats in store! Spooky Night Remastered is a Casual Fantasy FPS for the whole family We have overhauled and updated the original Spooky Night VR game also available for the Oculus Quest.

name: Combat Mission Shock Force 2: NATO Forces
description: NATO Forces is the third module in the Combat Mission: Shock Force family of contemporary land warfare simulations. Now you have a chance to play with the forces of three additional NATO countries; Germany, Canada, and the Netherlands.

name: Heroes of Dungeon
description: Heroes of Dungeon-a Game based on the mechanics of " 3 in a row" Features Fun and memorable graphics Epic music A wide variety of enemies

name: Time for You: Chapter 02 - Dirty Thoughts and Corporate Bots
description: The continuation of Time For You! There's something strange going on at ETMI Corp. Selena has been gone for too long and her coworkers are anything but normal. Find Selena, figure out what's going on, and get home. Should be easy, right?

name: One Shell Straight to Hell: X Layers of Fear
description: One Shell Straight to Hell X Layers of Fear is the crossover DLC nobody expected (nor asked for) that will give you a new unique and original perspective on the ending of the psychological horror game from Bloober Team. Expect lots of black humour, cursed paintings, and guns.

name: Mei Qi: Season 6
description: The sixth season of "Mei qi" series contains a total of 6 DLCs, which will be updated one after another. The update cycle is one DLC every 2 weeks.

name: Pretty Girls Mahjong Solitaire: Blue
description: More Pretty Girls!! Can you solve the puzzle? Find pairs of tiles to delete them. Delete all tiles before time runs out to clear a round. Once you make it to the third round a girl in a sexy costume begins to reveal herself as you delete tiles... As you clear stages, the girls get sexier and sexier!

name: Kalimba: The Dark Void - Solo
description: Enter the Dark Void and find out who the Dark Shaman really is… maybe. 10 levels of exciting solo puzzle-platforming that will have your head spinning - download now and enter the Dark Void!

name: XenoShyft: Forbidden Sciences
description: The Forbidden Sciences expansion includes all-new Division Cards for the Psychogenics Lab and Grafting Research divisions, as well as five all-new items for both Divisions, adding a wealth of new variety to your games!

name: XenoShyft: NorTec Elite
description: With this XenoShyft expansion, troops that survive a round in your lane will have the chance to be upgraded to heroes! And you'll randomly find experimental versions of items in your item stacks!

name: XenoShyft: Dreadmire
description: Welcome to the Dreadmire! XenoShyft: Dreadmire, which can be played as a standalone game or mixed with assets from XenoShyft: Onslaught, brings a new XenoShyft experience to your screen, with eight new troop types, 20 new item types, and more than 40 fearsome new enemy types.

name: Velucity: O2Jam Pack 1
description: Meet O2Jam's songs at VELUCITY. You can see about 20 selected O2Jam songs in a VELUCITY exclusive pattern.

name: Gubble
description: Gubble is a 3D action puzzle maze game featuring Gubbe D Gleep as he escapes each level by removing all of the screws, nuts and bolts.

name: The Trial
description: "Someone must have been telling lies about Josef K., he knew he had done nothing wrong but, one morning, he was arrested." Story about life, choices and a Man vs the System. This unique literature, even after 100 years is still up to date. Brought to You in early text-adventure games style.

name: Max Gentlemen: Animal Pack
description: 3 new characters, 6 new hats and the cannon level. Guest Starring Octodad!

name: Anarchy Legends: Online
description: Anarchy Legends Online is a multiplayer tactical action third-person shooter inspired by old competitive multiplayer games focusing on team-based tactics and real individual skills.

name: The Last Show of Mr. Chardish: Act I
description: Let's the show begin! The Last Show of Mr. Chardish: Act I is a prologue of "The Last Show of Mr. Chardish" full game. Together with the Actress Ella, embark on a journey through the past and discover the secrets left by the brilliant Director in his magical performances.

name: Jumping Joe! Friends Edition
description: Jump right into the action in this jolly pick ‘n play platformer. An Indie action game perfect for intense playtimes with your friends and family. Help Joe and his fellas on their upwards journey. Be quick as a flash and dodge roaring cannonballs, vicious bats and other traps.

name: Tiny Town VR: Zombie Pack
description: Zombie themed expansion pack for Tiny Town VR. Includes new characters, buildings, vehicles, and props.

name: Child of Light: The Golem's Plight Pack
description: The Golem's Plight Coffer contains the Golem quest, which unlocks another powerful ally to fight alonside Aurora. Also included in the pack are the unique, powerful Erin's Stone and a pack of smaller Rough oculi: 3 Blue, 3 Red and 3 Green.

name: Toxic Terror: Episode 2 - The Lich's Lair
description: A malicious lich has risen and is building an army of ghouls to take over the world. It must be stopped before it's too late for humanity!

name: Command Ops 2: Highway to the Reich Vol. 1
description: Highway to the Reich contains 13 scenarios covering the famous 1944 Operation Market Garden. Fought in Holland, it saw the Allied First Airborne Corps attempt to capture the cities of Eindhoven, Nijmegen and the ultimate prize Arnhem.

name: Command Ops 2: Knock on all Doors vol. 6
description: Knock on all Doors is a 12 scenarios covering the momentous decisions in the first 48 hours of the battle of the bulge in Belgium 1944.

name: Command Ops 2: Foothills of the Gods Vol. 2
description: Foothills of the Gods contains 19 scenarios, covering the German offensive to conquer Greece in 1941.

name: Command Ops 2: Bradley at Bay Vol. 8
description: Many of these battles involved low unit density over large map areas. This will be markedly different from the more highly congested Battles from the Bulge and Market Garden. They will also provide a good mix of different force types and qualities.

name: Command Ops 2: Bastogne Vol. 4
description: Bastogne contains 12 scenarios covering the southern shoulder of the 1944 Battle of the Bulge.

name: Command Ops 2: The Cauldron Vol. 5
description: The Cauldron Contains 20 Scenarios covering the famous battles in the Mediterranean and North Africa during 1941 through 1942

name: Command Ops 2: Ride of the Valkyries Vol. 3
description: Ride of the Valkyries contains 12 scenarios covering Hitler’s last offensive in what became known as the 1944 Battle of the Bulge.

name: Command Ops 2: Westwall Vol. 7
description: The Westwall series covers the Allied attempts to breach the vaunted Siegfried Line and drive into the heart of Germany in the fall of 1944. The scenarios range in size from Regimental actions through to Army level operations. Contains 12 scenarios.

name: Welcome to... Chichester 2: Part II - No Extra Regrets For the Future
description: Grendel Jinx is in danger of having to repeat a school year. Refusing to allow this to happen, she enlists the services of the protagonist - her newly found "Best Friend" - and is promptly rebuffed. Grendels drastic actions soon catches the attention of her mother.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation - Mini Island
description: Mini Island DLC introduces an island dungeon filled with miniature monsters, but with more experience points to gain!

name: Big Bash Cricket
description: Sin descripción

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - BV P188 Julia Mackin Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[BV P188] Julia Mackin Pack"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; U.S.A [W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - XB-35 Julia Mackin Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[XB-35] Julia Mackin Pack"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; U.S.A [W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - AVRO Spade Julia Mackin Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[AVRO Spade] Julia Mackin Pack"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; Great Britain [W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - Do335 Berta Hildebrand Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[Do335] Berta Hildebrand"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; German[W]

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - Ju87G Berta Hildebrand Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: HIS: Heroes in the Sky - Fa223 Berta Hildebrand Pack
description: This DLC include Premium airplane and othersPremium Airplane "[Fa223] Berta Hildebrand"Pre. Upgrade Kit x 20100 HIS$Love Potion x 10Decal; German [W]

name: World Table Tennis Champs
description: Sin descripción

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Mini-Pack 1
description: Travel back in time to the Old West, outwit a crafty hero-hunter, and use technopathic abilities to create mechanical golems from spare parts! Includes Unity, Ambuscade, and Silver Gulch, 1883.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Infernal Relics
description: Ancient deities, extra-planar elder gods, and dark spirits threaten the very fabric of reality! Includes The Argent Adept, NightMist, Akash'Bhuta, Apostate, The Ennead, GloomWeaver, Realm of Discord, and Tomb of Anubis.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Villains of the Multiverse
description: Villains of the Multiverse is a mega-expansion that adds to the Villain Team Mode introduced in the Vengeance expansion. This expansion includes ten villains, which can be faced in any configuration and combined with Vengeance villains, as well as four exciting new environments.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Mini-Pack 5 - Void Guard
description: Four heroes return to fight against the end of all things and hold back the Void when no one else can!

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: OblivAeon
description: The final mega-expansion includes 5 heroes, 5 environments, and the ultimate boss fight against OblivAeon itself!

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Wrath of the Cosmos
description: The Cosmos are leaving their mark on the Multiverse! Do you have what it takes to save the earth from the impending annihilation? Includes Captain Cosmic, Sky-Scraper, Deadline, Infinitor, Kaargra Warfang, Progeny, Dok’Thorath Capital, and The Enclave of the Endlings.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Rook City
description: Dark streets, vile sewers, and twisting alleys; all home to the terrible criminals that control this city. Welcome to Rook City, where evil never sleeps. Includes Expatriette, Mr. Fixer, The Chairman, The Matriarch, Plague Rat, Spite, Pike Industrial Complex, and Rook City.

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Shattered Timelines
description: Shattered Timelines introduces new mechanisms and exciting new challenges. Can you repair time before it runs out?! Includes Chrono-Ranger, Omnitron-X, La Capitan, The Dreamer, Kismet, Iron Legacy, The Block, & Time Cataclysm.

name: Blades of Time: Dismal Swamp
description: Michelle rushes into the Temple of Dragons to prevent Ayumi from joining Keeper of Chaos when her shuttle suddenly crashes in the middle of Dismal Swamp.

name: Goddess of Card War: DLC-2
description: A new card character can be purchased in the mall: Manli

name: Goddess of Card War: DLC-1
description: A new card character can be purchased in the mall: Yulou
